title: Working Out Loud (WOL) Practice Course for Agile Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of job-related basic language proficiency
context.additional_context: A program for practitioners to experience agile learning methods immediately applicable in work environments. Utilizes collaboration tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting.

learning_goals: Learners can share and receive real-time feedback on three or more work-related language learning scenarios using the WOL (Workplace Online Learning) technique
Learners can maintain sustainable WOL behavioral patterns with over 70% participation until six months later
Learners can directly apply at least two of the four psychological empowerment elements (meaning, competence, self-determination, impact) in the workplace
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
